book.synopsis: Reveals the daily lives of Russian people during the rule of the Romanovs, including the celebrated serf actor Mikhail Shchepkin, Princess Catherine Dashkova, and others of the period
book.title_long: What Life Was Like in the Time of War and Peace: Imperial Russia, Ad 1696-1917
